body.section: Hierarchy ClinicStop is a kind of ServiceDeliveryLocation

section.title: Description
section.p: Identifies various nodes within a workflow process that is typically performed by a Medical Service. Used to facilitate collection of workload and financial information. This is equivalent to File 40.7 in Vista.

stentry.p: Identifies various nodes within a workflow process that is typically performed by the Service. Used to facilitate collection of workload and financial information.
